'''''White's Illusion''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to talk to any ghost on [[Tsurumi Island]] after completing the {{Quest|Through the Mists}}.

==Trivia==
* The achievement's name and description are a reference to the song "{{Ja|白の幻影}}" by Japanese musical group {{w|Sound Horizon}}.
